name: Empiric Network
info: Designed and implemented the website of the StarkNet oracle Empiric Network. Includes live price feeds, a command pallet, and a thorough content section. I also wrote upgradable smart contracts using proxies on StarkNet and GitHub Actions to test them.

name: Raycast Extensions
info: Multiple open source Raycast extensions with over 11k downloads. Google Maps Search allows you to quickly open Google Maps directions, for example from your current location to your home.

name: Psetgroups
info: Built to help Stanford students find problem set groups for their classes. Creates optimal matches using using Edmonds' blossom algorithm.
